title: Rana strongly condemns attack on police van in Rahim Yar Khan
content:
ISLAMABAD, Aug 23 (APP):Adviser to the Prime Minister on Inter-Provincial Coordination (IPC) and Political Affairs, Rana Sanaullah on Friday has strongly condemned the attack by bandits on police vehicles in Kacha area in Rahim Yar Khan.
Rana Sanaullah in a press release expressed his heartfelt sympathy and condolence to the families of the martyrs and said that in this hour of grief, the Punjab Police stand with the families of the martyred policemen. He has demanded the Punjab government and IG Punjab Police to immediately arrest the culprits of this sad incident and bring them to justice.
While paying homage to the martyred police personnel, Rana Sanaullah said that the “sacrifice of these martyrs for the sake of our country and duty will not go in vain”. He also prayed for the speedy recovery of the injured policemen.
